entry.title: deephabiswashi/WebAI-UI: A privacy-focused, lightweight web UI for AI model interaction, supporting local & remote LLMs via OpenAI-compatible APIs. Features include conversation storage, file uploads, configurable model/API settings, real-time updates (WebSockets), auto-summarization, and customizable system prompts.
entry.content: A privacy-focused, lightweight web UI for AI model interaction, supporting local & remote LLMs via OpenAI-compatible APIs. Features include conversation storage, file uploads, configurable model/API settings, real-time updates (WebSockets), auto-summarization, and customizable system prompts.
